prerequisites: Access to a computer with internet connection
Willingness to learn and problem-solve independently
outcomes: Master HTML and CSS for responsive web design
Build full-stack applications with modern frameworks
Work with databases and data management
Navigate the job search and interview process
Develop strong problem-solving and debugging skills
